sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Ukraine has confirmed two more cargo vessels have left its Black Sea ports by a temporary corridor, defying Russian threats to its shipping.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In Mongolia, Pope Francis has said governments have nothing to fear from the church's evangelical mission and that it has no political motive.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Americans Jim Walmsley and Courtney de Walter won first place in both the men's and women's Chamonix ultramarathon races in France.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Italian film stars, a lifetime achievement award for Hong Kong's Tony Leung and a red carpet protest against Iran, all at the Venice Film Festival.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: President Zelensky has confirmed that two more cargo vessels left Ukraine on Friday via the Black Sea temporary grain corridor, defying Russian threats.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In a post on X, formerly Twitter, he thanked port workers who'd loaded the two vessels with iron and iron ore concentrate and repeated an appeal for allies to provide more air defense systems to help secure safe passage for ukrainian shipping ukraine's border guard service said that its soldiers spotted and destroyed new fortifications that were being constructed by russian soldiers in the kharkiv region near kiev a mobile air defense unit received a visit from a senior general.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: They were credited with downing a Russian X-101 cruise missile with their Stinger system in August.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In President Zelensky's nightly address, he thanked all those helping to protect the three cities of Odessa, Sumy and Lysychansk.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Pope Francis praised Mongolia's active role in promoting world peace and highlighted the contribution of the small Mongolian Catholic Church to building a prosperous society in a speech in Ulaanbaatar.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: He said governments had nothing to fear from the Church. Ecco perché i governi e le istituzioni secolari non hanno nulla da temere dell'azione evangelizzatrice della Chiesa, perché essa non ha un'agenda politica da portare avanti, ma conosce solo la forza umile della grazia di Dio e di una parola di misericordia e di verità capace di promuovere il bene di tutti. Later, the Pope praised the indigenous wisdom of Mongolia's heritage.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Pilgrims have come from neighboring countries for the four-day visit. Two Americans made history in the Dacia UTMB Mont Blanc Ultramarathon in Chamonix.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Jim Wormsley won the 20th edition's men's competition in a time of 19 hours, 37 minutes and 43 seconds.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Britain's Tom Evans and Wormsley's fellow American Zach Miller came second and third, respectively.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: He's the first American ever to win the men's event.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In the women's competition, Courtney DeWalter's win completed the American double with a timing of 23 hours, 29 minutes and 14 seconds.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The win at Mont Blanc is her third after the 2019 and 2021 titles.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Katarina Hartmuth of Germany and French competitor Blondine L. Irondel finished second and third.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Two and a half thousand people entered the spectacular 171-kilometre race through France, Italy and Switzerland.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: An emotional Tony Leung received a Lifetime Achievement Award at the Venice Film Festival.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Hong Kong actor has starred in three films that have won the Golden Lion, most recently Lust and Caution in 2007.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Its director Ang Lee presented the award. Leung joked that he finally had a golden lion to himself.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The red carpet witnessed a flash mob action at the festival for the second consecutive year showing solidarity with the people of Iran.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The director, Saeed Roustai, was recently jailed for six months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Jury members Damien Chazelle, Martin McDonagh, Jane Campion and Saleh Bakri, alongside members of the film industry, stood on the red carpet to raise awareness of the plight of Iran's people and its filmmakers.
